synopsis.text:
All worlds, dimensions, and life forms are interconnected, with each entity harboring the desire to attain enlightenment through Taoism. However, only a select few can embark on this journey, leading to a constant struggle among all races and spirits. In this vast universe, our protagonist, Ye Yu, finds himself transported to another realm, only to be thrust into an unexpected marriage.

Ye Yu's arrival in this new world is far from ordinary, as he lands in front of a powerful sect leader who is on the hunt for a suitable fake husband for his daughter. With his path of cultivation now set in motion, Ye Yu embarks on a journey to uncover the secrets of time and the mysteries surrounding the rulers who harvest the Taoists and their worlds.

As Ye Yu delves deeper into the intricacies of this magnificent world, he experiences love, friendship, and personal growth. With a determination to cleanse the Taoist heart and confront the masters who harvest all races, Ye Yu's epic tale unfolds, promising a captivating adventure for all who join him on this extraordinary journey.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
